data.name: Black Bolt
data.description: The King of the Inhumans, Black Bolt is a Blaster whose voice deals massive damage and prevents enemies from reviving.

starItems.name: Black Bolt
starItems.description: The King of the Inhumans, Black Bolt is a Blaster whose voice deals massive damage and prevents enemies from reviving.

2.nextUpgrade:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target

3.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effects on primary target

4.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

5.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on primary target

6.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.
6.nextUpgrade:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects on self
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target

7.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects on self.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, instead, attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, instead, attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, instead, attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, instead, attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, instead, attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, instead, attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, instead, attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all targets
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> damage to all targets
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> or <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Characters killed by Black Bolt cannot be revived.

When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. If that enemy is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>TECH</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage instead.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
1.nextUpgrade:
On enemy summon, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on the summoner
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health

2.description:
Characters killed by Black Bolt cannot be revived.

When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. If that enemy is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>TECH</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage instead.

On enemy summon, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on the summoner.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

3.description:
Characters killed by Black Bolt cannot be revived.

When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. If that enemy is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>TECH</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage instead.

On enemy summon, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on the summoner.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on summoner
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance for self, <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies, and, in <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies, and, in <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies

4.description:
Characters killed by Black Bolt cannot be revived.

When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. If that enemy is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>TECH</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage instead.

On enemy summon, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on the summoner.

Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage
+<color=#86e619>200%</color> damage to <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>TECH</color> enemies
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies, and, in <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies

5.description:
Characters killed by Black Bolt cannot be revived.

When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. If that enemy is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>TECH</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage instead.

On enemy summon, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on the summoner.

Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
